entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 211,394Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 561

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he‚Äôs encountered‚Äîdisciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.

entry.title: dark blue land mine
entry.summary:
Author: bittercape

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,289Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 82

Summary: Dick really, really doesn‚Äôt want to tell Bruce what the problem is. He hasn‚Äôt even told Jason what the problem is. He can‚Äôt imagine Bruce will be impressed by how he‚Äôs losing control; he‚Äôs never been particularly endeared by his temper. Unlike Jason, who thinks it‚Äôs wonderful and entertaining now that he no longer is in the crossfire between Dick and Bruce.Unfortunately, Batman has not gotten his reputation by accident, and Bruce, whatever else he is, is always Batman. He looks at Dick, looks at the angles around the room to check what he‚Äôs looking at ‚Äì and what he‚Äôs not looking at.

Author: thepurplespirit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,906Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: A magical accident swaps Dick and Jason into each other‚Äôs bodies for 48 hours. Jason hates how easily the world loves Dick. Dick realises how quiet and brutal Jason‚Äôs life really is. Neither of them comes out unchanged‚Äîand when they return to their own skin, they can‚Äôt pretend nothing happened. What starts as resentment turns into understanding, and then something softer. Something real.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,839Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 112

entry.title: the miraculous torture of jason todd
entry.summary:
Author: nux_myristica

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,906Chapters: 2/9Kudos: 96

Summary: It's not the job that goes wrong, oh no. It's the few moments after, as Jason speeds down Gotham streets on his motorcycle. It has nothing to do with Dick's absolutely bizarre bet with Steph about whether or not he can twerk while driving his bike. Clearly, Dick has no part in why Jason breaks his leg whatsoever. Jason did NOT see that and did NOT drive straight into a metal railing on the road because he was so damn distracted, no sir!Lies, lies, all lies.But Jason won't say any of this to Dick. Can't say no to Dick, either. Which is why Jason ends up at Dick's apartment instead of the manor to heal, living and breathing a perpetual nightmare-turned-wet-dream.
